poses.name: Washington Crossing the Delaware
poses.description: Your dog as General Washington crossing the Delaware River in the famous Revolutionary War painting
poses.prompt: Recreation of Washington Crossing the Delaware painting - this exact dog as General Washington standing heroically in boat crossing icy river, Revolutionary War uniform with cape flowing, soldiers rowing boat, American flag, chunks of ice in water, dramatic historical oil painting style, 8k, highly detailed. CRITICAL: Preserve the exact breed, fur color, facial features, and markings from the reference image.

poses.name: Rocky at the Steps
poses.description: Your dog as Rocky Balboa with arms raised triumphantly at the top of the Philadelphia Museum steps
poses.prompt: Recreation of the iconic Rocky Balboa victory pose - this exact dog standing at top of Philadelphia Museum of Art steps with both arms raised triumphantly overhead, wearing grey sweatsuit and sweatband, sunrise lighting, view of Philadelphia city in background, inspiring movie scene, cinematic photography, 8k, highly detailed. CRITICAL: Preserve the exact breed, fur color, facial features, and markings from the reference image.

poses.name: Babe Ruth Called Shot
poses.description: Your dog as Babe Ruth pointing to the outfield in the legendary called shot moment
poses.prompt: Recreation of Babe Ruth called shot moment - this exact dog in Yankees pinstripe uniform pointing dramatically to outfield with bat in other paw, 1930s baseball stadium background, vintage black and white photography style, legendary baseball moment, 8k, highly detailed. CRITICAL: Preserve the exact breed, fur color, facial features, and markings from the reference image.

poses.name: NFL Team Photo
poses.description: Your dog as an NFL player in official team photo - pick your team and jersey number!
poses.prompt: Professional NFL team photo - this exact dog's head on football player body wearing {TEAM} uniform and helmet with number {NUMBER} jersey, full football pads and gear, black eye paint under eyes, official team photo background with {TEAM} colors and logo, studio lighting, heroic pose standing with arms crossed or holding football, professional sports photography, 8k, highly detailed. CRITICAL: Preserve the exact breed, fur color, facial features, and markings from the reference image for the dog's head. Only the body should be human NFL player.
